name: Vive la révolution
description:
This game was made for the ludum dare game jam 49. The theme is "Unstable". 

You control a revolutionizing mob during unstable political times. The goal is to capture the most important building of the city - the dome.

On your way you will loot buildings to aquire new followers, find items. The police is trying their best to shut the revolution down. They will move strategically across the map and get reinforced periodically, so dont feel to save after over

coming the first group! 

The map is based on the german city Aachen, around the Aachener dome. parts of the map got modified to allow for easier navigation.
